sentences.en: an intermediate coursebook
sentences.cn: 中级课本

sentences.en: an intermediate stage during which the disease is dormant
sentences.cn: 疾病处于潜伏状态的中期

sentences.en: an intermediate stage/step in a process
sentences.cn: 中间阶段 / 步骤

sentences.en: For intermediate doses, the corresponding slant distances can be estimated by interpolation.
sentences.cn: 对于中间的剂量, 可以用内插法把相应的斜距估计出来.

sentences.en: Generally speaking, they are " intermediate " in some aspects between apes and men.
sentences.cn: 一般说来, 他们在某些方面是介乎猿和人之间的 “ 中间环节. ”

sentences.en: Gray is intermediate between black and white.
sentences.cn: 灰色介于黑色和白色之间.

sentences.en: If you must use descendant selectors, prefer child selectors, which at least only require evaluation of one additional node, not all the intermediate nodes up to an ancestor.
sentences.cn: 如果您必须使用后代选择器，尽量使用子代选择器，这最少只需评估一个额外的节点，而非中间直至祖先的所有节点。

sentences.en: In this process the nucleus breaks up into two intermediate - sized nuclei.
sentences.cn: 在这种过程中,那个原子核分裂成两个中等大小的核.

sentences.en: Intermediate arrays have porosities falling between these limits.
sentences.cn: 中间的排列方式,孔隙率介于这两个值之间.

sentences.en: Intermediate frequency instability has had the most uneven history.
sentences.cn: 中频不稳定性的研究经历了极为曲折的道路.

sentences.en: No intermediate states are recognized or accepted.
sentences.cn: 不能识别或接受任何中间状态.

sentences.en: Now consider the appearance of the trial function at intermediate values if R.
sentences.cn: 现在考虑R在中等数值时,尝试函数的表现.

sentences.en: Of an intermediate balance, under the circumstances, there is no possibility.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下, 要想不好不坏,保持中不溜的状态, 是根本做不到的.

sentences.en: The intermediate ground , however, was beautifully studded with timber.
sentences.cn: 中间的那片园地上, 很美丽地点缀着林木.

sentences.en: There are intermediate varieties known as cannel coal.
sentences.cn: 有一些中间性的变种,叫做烛煤.

sentences.en: There is an intermediate type of ryegrass first produced by a New Zealand plant breeder.
sentences.cn: 还有一类中期黑麦草,为新西兰一名植物培养家首先培育出来.

sentences.en: This will allow a maximum yield of the reaction intermediate which is the desired product.
sentences.cn: 这样可以得到最高产率的反应中间物,即目的产物.

sentences.en: When the PCY valve sticks in the intermediate position, the engine idles rough and stalls frequently.
sentences.cn: PCV阀在过渡状况被粘住时, 发动机会出现怠速不稳和频繁息火的故障.

sentences.en: You can then use this FIFO file to move information from one application to another without storing the data in an intermediate file.
sentences.cn: 然后，您可以使用此 FIFO 文件将信息从一个应用程序移到另一个应用程序，而不需要将数据存储在中间文件中。

sentences.en: You should consider breaking the journey with intermediate stopovers at airport hotels.
sentences.cn: 你应该考虑将旅程分为几段，中途在机场旅馆稍作停留。

words.tran_cn: 中间的；对话的；对话体的
中间人；仲裁者；调解者；媒介物
调解；仲裁；调停；作中间人

phrases.tran_cn: 化学半成品；化学中间体
中压；[机械]中间压力；次高压；中压中间压力
中间产品；半成品；中间乘积
[计]中间阶段；[计]中间级；[医]中间期
中层水；过渡带水；中间水域
中间区；过渡带；二次燃烧区

trans.tran_en: an intermediate stage in a process of development is between two other stages

trans.tran_cn: 中间物，中间分子，中间人
